Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to videoconferencing at public meetings and requiring that the minutes of a public meeting at which videoconferencing is used reflect such fact and the extent of such participation
Summary: Relates to videoconferencing at public meetings; requires that the minutes of a public meeting at which videoconferencing is used reflect such fact and the extent of such participation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to videoconferencing at public meetings and requiring that the minutes of a public meeting at which videoconferencing is used reflect such fact
